verses.verse: And it shall be,<WH1961> when<WH3588> thou art come in<WH935> unto<WH413> the land<WH776> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> giveth<WH5414> thee for an inheritance,<WH5159> and possessest<WH3423> it, and dwellest<WH3427> therein;

That thou shalt take<WH3947> of the first<WH4480> <WH7225> of all<WH3605> the fruit<WH6529> of the earth,<WH127> which<WH834> thou shalt bring<WH935> of thy land<WH4480> <WH776> that<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> giveth<WH5414> thee, and shalt put<WH7760> it in a basket,<WH2935> and shalt go<WH1980> unto<WH413> the place<WH4725> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> shall choose<WH977> to place<WH7931> his name<WH8034> there.<WH8033>

And thou shalt go<WH935> unto<WH413> the priest<WH3548> that<WH834> shall be<WH1961> in those<WH1992> days,<WH3117> and say<WH559> unto<WH413> him, I profess<WH5046> this day<WH3117> unto the LORD<WH3068> thy God,<WH430> that<WH3588> I am come<WH935> unto<WH413> the country<WH776> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> swore<WH7650> unto our fathers<WH1> for to give<WH5414> us.
And the priest<WH3548> shall take<WH3947> the basket<WH2935> out of thine hand,<WH4480> <WH3027> and set it down<WH5117> before<WH6440> the altar<WH4196> of the LORD<WH3068> thy God.<WH430>

And thou shalt speak<WH6030> and say<WH559> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> thy God,<WH430> A Syrian<WH761> ready to perish<WH6> was my father,<WH1> and he went down<WH3381> into Egypt,<WH4714> and sojourned<WH1481> there<WH8033> with a few,<WH4962> <WH4592> and became<WH1961> there<WH8033> a nation,<WH1471> great,<WH1419> mighty,<WH6099> and populous: <WH7227>
And the Egyptians<WH4713> evil entreated<WH7489> us, and afflicted<WH6031> us, and laid<WH5414> upon<WH5921> us hard<WH7186> bondage: <WH5656>

And when we cried<WH6817> unto<WH413> the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of our fathers,<WH1> the LORD<WH3068> heard<WH8085> <WH853> our voice,<WH6963> and looked on<WH7200> <WH853> our affliction,<WH6040> and our labor,<WH5999> and our oppression: <WH3906>

And the LORD<WH3068> brought us forth<WH3318> out of Egypt<WH4480> <WH4714> with a mighty<WH2389> hand,<WH3027> and with an outstretched<WH5186> arm,<WH2220> and with great<WH1419> terribleness,<WH4172> and with signs,<WH226> and with wonders: <WH4159>

And he hath brought<WH935> us into<WH413> this<WH2088> place,<WH4725> and hath given<WH5414> us<WH853> this<WH2063> land,<WH776> even a land<WH776> that floweth<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey.<WH1706>

And now,<WH6258> behold,<WH2009> I have brought<WH935> <WH853> the firstfruits<WH7225> <WH6529> of the land,<WH127> which<WH834> thou, O LORD,<WH3068> hast given<WH5414> me. And thou shalt set<WH5117> it before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> thy God,<WH430> and worship<WH7812> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> thy God: <WH430>

And thou shalt rejoice<WH8055> in every<WH3605> good<WH2896> thing which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> hath given<WH5414> unto thee, and unto thine house,<WH1004> thou,<WH859> and the Levite,<WH3881> and the stranger<WH1616> that<WH834> is among<WH7130> you.

When <WH3588> thou hast made an end<WH3615> of tithing<WH6237> <WH853> all<WH3605> the tithes<WH4643> of thine increase<WH8393> the third<WH7992> year,<WH8141> which is the year<WH8141> of tithing,<WH4643> and hast given<WH5414> it unto the Levite,<WH3881> the stranger,<WH1616> the fatherless,<WH3490> and the widow,<WH490> that they may eat<WH398> within thy gates,<WH8179> and be filled;<WH7646>

Then thou shalt say<WH559> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> thy God,<WH430> I have brought away<WH1197> the hallowed things<WH6944> out of<WH4480> mine house,<WH1004> and also<WH1571> have given<WH5414> them unto the Levite,<WH3881> and unto the stranger,<WH1616> to the fatherless,<WH3490> and to the widow,<WH490> according to all<WH3605> thy commandments<WH4687> which<WH834> thou hast commanded<WH6680> me: I have not<WH3808> transgressed<WH5674> thy commandments,<WH4480> <WH4687> neither<WH3808> have I forgotten<WH7911> them:

I have not<WH3808> eaten<WH398> thereof<WH4480> in my mourning,<WH205> neither<WH3808> have I taken away<WH1197> aught thereof<WH4480> for any unclean<WH2931> use, nor<WH3808> given<WH5414> aught thereof<WH4480> for the dead:<WH4191> but I have hearkened<WH8085> to the voice<WH6963> of the LORD<WH3068> my God,<WH430> and have done<WH6213> according to all<WH3605> that<WH834> thou hast commanded<WH6680> me.

Look down<WH8259> from thy holy<WH6944> habitation,<WH4480> <WH4583> from<WH4480> heaven,<WH8064> and bless<WH1288> <WH853> thy people<WH5971> <WH853> Israel,<WH3478> and the land<WH127> which<WH834> thou hast given<WH5414> us, as<WH834> thou sworest<WH7650> unto our fathers,<WH1> a land<WH776> that floweth<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey.<WH1706>

This <WH2088> day<WH3117> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> hath commanded<WH6680> thee to do<WH6213> <WH853> these<WH428> statutes<WH2706> and judgments:<WH4941> thou shalt therefore keep<WH8104> and do<WH6213> them with all<WH3605> thine heart,<WH3824> and with all<WH3605> thy soul.<WH5315>

Thou hast avouched<WH559> <WH853> the LORD<WH3068> this day<WH3117> to be<WH1961> thy God,<WH430> and to walk<WH1980> in his ways,<WH1870> and to keep<WH8104> his statutes,<WH2706> and his commandments,<WH4687> and his judgments,<WH4941> and to hearken<WH8085> unto his voice: <WH6963>

And the LORD<WH3068> hath avouched<WH559> thee this day<WH3117> to be<WH1961> his peculiar<WH5459> people,<WH5971> as<WH834> he hath promised<WH1696> thee, and that thou shouldest keep<WH8104> all<WH3605> his commandments;<WH4687>

And to make<WH5414> thee high<WH5945> above<WH5921> all<WH3605> nations<WH1471> which<WH834> he hath made,<WH6213> in praise,<WH8416> and in name,<WH8034> and in honor;<WH8597> and that thou mayest be<WH1961> a holy<WH6918> people<WH5971> unto the LORD<WH3068> thy God,<WH430> as<WH834> he hath spoken.<WH1696>
